{"id":668375383,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"9Â months","timestamp":1648396770,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"26 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/668375383/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int m = word1.size();\n        int n = word2.size();\n        \n        vector<vector<int>>dp(m + 1, vector<int>(n + 1, 0));\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)\n            dp[i + 1][0] = (i + 1);\n        for(int j = 0; j < n; j++)\n            dp[0][j + 1] = (j + 1);\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < m; i++){\n            for(int j = 0; j < n; j++){\n                if(word1[i] == word2[j])\n                    dp[i + 1][j + 1] = dp[i][j];\n                else dp[i + 1][j + 1] = 1 + min(dp[i][j], min(dp[i + 1][j], dp[i][j + 1]));\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return dp[m][n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
